title: ‘Real queens fix each other’s crowns’- Pushpika
content: Pushpika De Silva was announced as the winner of Mrs. Sri Lanka for Mrs. World pageant and was crowned by Mrs. World Caroline Jurie last night (04).However, Jurie later announced that the winner cannot contest as she was a divorcee and decided to crown the first-runner up as the new winner instead.On Facebook statement, De Silva said 'Living separately and being divorced are two completely separate things,' emphasising that she is not a divorcee even at the moment of posting the statement.            De Silva further said 'Real queens fix each other’s crowns'.
